plugin.name: Clock Plugin
plugin.description: Shows a clock with the time in the toolbar
plugin.description-es_ES: Muestra un reloj con la hora actual en la barra de herramientas
plugin.changelog: *1.0.2* Be sure its visible on 2.30 when there are no action buttons *1.0.1* Updates for new 2.30 fop2 client *1.0.0* Stable release
